sentences.en: Chagrin is not something a great man often acknowledges.
sentences.cn: 一位伟大的人物往往是不肯承认自己恼羞成怒的.

sentences.en: He noted with chagrin how little hair clung to his head.
sentences.cn: 他苦恼地发现原来他头上的毛发是那麽的稀疏.

sentences.en: He took the book, to Paul's immense chagrin, and began the copying himself.
sentences.cn: 他拿过薄子自己抄起来, 弄得保罗十分沮丧.

sentences.en: He was preoccupied with chagrin and etiquette.
sentences.cn: 他耿耿于怀的是经受的是屈辱和应有的仪礼.

sentences.en: His increasingly visible chagrin sets up a vicious circle.
sentences.cn: 他的明显的不满引起了一种恶性循环.

sentences.en: I am at a loss to find words with which to express my chagrin and grief.
sentences.cn: 我实在寻不出适当的字句来表白心中的悔恨与悲痛.

sentences.en: Much to his chagrin, he did not win the game.
sentences.cn: 使他非常懊恼的是, 他在比赛中未能取胜.

sentences.en: Much to his chagrin, he did not win the race.
sentences.cn: 使他大为懊恼的是他赛跑没获胜.

sentences.en: Oh is crawling, more power chagrin.
sentences.cn: 哦,是爬行, 更多的权力懊恼.

sentences.en: One of the first things we did when we moved in, to the chagrin of the architect, was to replace the leaded windows.
sentences.cn: 让建筑师大为懊恼的是，我们搬进去最先做的事情之一就是换掉了花饰铅条窗。

sentences.en: Plaisir d'amour ne dure qu'un moment, chagrin d'amour dure toute la vie.
sentences.cn: 爱的快乐只存在一时, 而爱的悲伤却残留一世.

sentences.en: Pour le bleu d'un amour ou le gris d'un chagrin.
sentences.cn: 为了蓝色的爱情或是灰色的愁闷.

sentences.en: She felt chagrin at being rejected.
sentences.cn: 她因遭拒绝而感到懊丧.

sentences.en: To the chagrin of their parents, neither Phil nor Pam went to church anymore.
sentences.cn: 令父母失望的是，菲尔和帕姆都再也不去教堂了。

sentences.en: What's Chagrin Falls and what happened there?
sentences.cn: 什么是懊丧的秋天那里发生了什么?

sentences.en: When my mother says that, I always feel very chagrin.
sentences.cn: 当我的母亲说, 我总觉得非常懊恼.

trans.tran_cn: （由失败等引起的）懊恼，懊丧，悔恨
trans.tran_en: annoyance and disappointment because something has not happened the way you hoped
